DOC.brief_title: The Effect Eprosartan Hormones Kidney Function Healthy Humans .
DOC.criteria: Both gender . Age 18 65 year . Body mass index less equal 30 kg/m2 . Women must use oral hormonal anticonception , use intrauterine anticonceptive device , sterilized/hysterectomized postmenopausal . History clinical sign heart , lung , kidney , endocrine organ disease . Abnormal biochemical screening blood regarding : Bhemoglobin , Psodium , Ppotassium , Pcreatinine , Palbumin , Pbilirubin , Palanine aminotransferase , Palkaline phosphatase , Pcholesterol , Bglucose . Abnormal screen urine regarding : albumin glucose Malignant disease . Known arterial hypertension measure 24 hour blood pressure 135 mmHg systolic 85 mmHg diastolic . Alcohol abuse . Smoking . Drug use abuse . Known intolerance allergy eprosartan sodium nitroprusside . Blood donation within 1 month start study .
